description: This walk ties together Katoomba Falls, Leura Cascades, and Wentworth Falls with the many lookouts across Jamison Valley in between, before ending with the famous Darwins Walk.

markers.description: Get the train to Katoomba using transportnsw.info.
Cross the road from the station and follow Katoomba Street.
Past the hostel turn right down Edwards Street.
Cross the 5 way intersection onto Neale Street
At the end of Neale Street, follow Peckmans Road to the left.
At the end of Peckmans Road follow Cliff Drive to the left to the Katoomba Falls kiosk.
Get the bus to/from Katoomba Falls Kiosk using transportnsw.info.
Across the road from the kiosk are amenities.
From the kiosk carpark follow the path into the reserve.
At the intersection follow the signs for the Price Henry Cliff walk to the cascades.
Cross the creek at the cascades and follow the signs to the Prince Henry Cliff walk.
Climb the stairs up from the cascades and follow the Price Henry Cliff Walk to the Three Sisters.
Follow the paved trail along the cliff edges and lookouts.
At the intersection follow the signs to the Three Sisters / Echo Point.
Take the ramp up to the Three Sisters lookout and information centre.
Get the bus to/from Echo Point using transportnsw.info.
There's public toilets near the visitor centre.
Follow the Three Sisters Walking Track starting to the left of the information centre.
From the intersection near the Three Sisters follow the Grand Cliff Top Walk sign to Wentworth Falls up the stairway.
From the top of the stairway, follow the Prince Henry Cliff  Walk to the Solitary Kiosk.
At the Solitary Kiosk follow Cliff Drive a short distance in the direction of the cascades.
From the corner of Cliff Drive follow the trailhead to Leura Cascades.
From the intersection with the Amphitheatre Track follow the Grand Cliff Top Walk signs to the cascades.
Cross the creek at the cascades and follow Prince Henry Cliff walk back out of the gully.
From the Leura Cascades Picnic Area, follow the Grand Cliff Top Walk sign to Wentworth Falls.
Follow the paved path along the cliffs past the lookouts.
Follow the Grand Cliff Top Walk to the Gordon falls picnic area.
From the picnic area follow the signs to the Pool of Siloam.
Follow the stairway all the way down to the pool and up the other side.
From the top follow the Grand Cliff Top Walk sign to Wentworth Falls.
The trail ends at suburban cul-de-sac, follow the Willoughby Road to the right to Sublime Point Road.
Turn left down Sublime Point Road and follow it to the Leura Golf Club.
At the intersection with Watkins Road, turn right towards the Leura Golf Club.
Follow Fairmont Place right towards the Fairmont Resort.
At the Fairmont Resort turn right into the carpark.
Behind the resort continue on Lillians Bridge Track.
Follow the signs to Wentworth Falls along the golf course.
After the boardwalk follow Valley of the Waters Track around the golf course.
Cross Valley of the Waters Creek across the bridge.
On the other side of Valley of the Waters Creek follow the Grand Cliff Top Walk sign right to Wentworth Falls.
At the intersection to Empress Falls, take the staircase up.
From the intersection from the Overcliff Walk to the right.
+500m Optionally follow the Valley of the Waters track all the way up to Conservation Hut Cafe

Get the bus to/from Conservation Hut using transportnsw.info.
This bus service is very infrequent.
At the intersection follow the sign to Wentworth Falls.
At the next intersection follow the sign to Wentworth Falls car park.
At the intersection wiht the shortcut Track follow the sign to Wentworth Falls.
After crossing Den Fenella Creek, follow the Grand Cliff Top Walk sign right to Wentworth Falls.
This should be called Concussion Rock.
markers.title: Mind Your Head
markers.instruction: Visit this location to earn the mystery trophy

markers.description: At Fletchers Lookout follow the sign to Wentworth Falls Track.
At the intersection with the Weeping Rock Walking Track, follow the Grand Cliff Top Walk to the left.
+100m Optionally follow the track right to the falls.
From the intersection with Weeping Rock Walking Track follow the sign right to Charles Darwin Walk
Follow the trail down to Weeping Rock
Climb the staircase up Weeping Rock.
From the intersection follow Darwins Walk to the right to Wentworth Falls Village.
From the end of Darwins Walk cross Wilson Park to the right.
There are public toilets near the playground.
At the far end of Wilsons Park, follow the Great Western Highway to the right to the traffic lights.
Cross at the traffic light and follow Station Road.
Cross the street at Coronation Park and cross the station overpass.
Plan your return trip from Wentworth Falls at transportnsw.info.
